summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2582 for the improvement of the Alley in Block Thirty-four Division No. 5, Capitol Hill Addition, being the alley between Twentieth and Twenty-first Avenue North, from East Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle by paving the same with asphalt or other suitable material and that such other work be done as may be necessary in connection therewith.
